pages.text: The Exhausted Swallow - an elixir that bestows upon its drinker potent regenerative abilities, allowing swift healing of any wounds and a quick return to battle. What is the catch? The price that must be paid - upon consumption, the potion severely burns the esophagus, causing excruciating pain that may drive one to madness. $(n)It is not recommended to be taken during combat or if HP is below 50%$().

pages.title: Potion Crafting
pages.text: One renowned witch...er could brew the Swallow on the go or while meditating!
